name: Maze Dungeon
description:
Maze Dungeon is an action roguelite game with 3D Voxel graphics . This game is inspired by collectible and growing roguelite games like Binding of Isaac and Risk of Rain . Navigate through a dungeon full of various equipment, unique artifacts , maze-like complex dungeons, and powerful enemies .

Grow your character

You can level up by killing monsters in the dungeon to gain experience points. Each character class has its own unique skills, and enhance your skills to defeat enemies with your own skillset .

Acquire various equipment

Players can acquire different grades of equipment in the dungeon, and various enchantments exist. Get powerful equipment to strengthen your character

Collect unique and powerful artifacts

Maze Dungeon has unique and powerful artifacts . Collect various artifacts and clear the dungeon .

Procedurally generated complex dungeons

In Maze Dungeon, dungeons are created in a procedurally complex and diverse manner for each stage rather than a fixed structure. As the stage progresses, more complex and powerful enemies appear.

Various unlockable classes

conditions to unlock various classes. Each character has unique stats and skills, and offers a variety of play styles.
